mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Peirpoint, Larkin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Received at Grafton Aug 30th 1861. By Telegraph from Cornwallis To Genl Kelley The Company made up by Col D V Cox is quartered at Ritchie Court House & has been for the last two days waiting to be mustered into service let me know how soon Col Wilkinson can muster us in. L Peirpoint 40Gr85Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Peirpoint, Larkin
Cornwallis, (West) Virginia
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Kelley, Benjamin F.
